website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a camera stabilizer that stands out for its comfortable handle and versatility, this reasonably-priced option is worth considering.
pros: Multifunctional design can handle four different types of devices, including action cameras, smartphones, DSLR cameras, and camcorders
Handle is covered in foam, which makes it easy and comfortable to grip
Price falls on the lower end of the spectrum
cons: Difficult to steady in some fast-action situations
Has a few plastic components that aren't very durable and are prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: A handle, not a stabilizer and no good for me, but still 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is handle for a camera. It is not a stabilizer. Why am I giving 5 stars? Because it is exactly what the manufacturer says it is - they clearly state no gimbal, no batteries - and it is well manufactured. I got caught up in all the reviews saying it helped stabilize video. I guess it could, if the reason for your shaky video is because you had to hold your camera/phone with two hands and now you can use one. But the device itself has no anti-shake or anti-shock springs or anything - it is entirely rigid. But still a nice handle.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great stabilizer to start out with
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product for a few days now; however, the first impression is pretty good! It is easy to hold but, can be a pain to carry in a bag with other gear. For under $30 it does a great job at stabilizing the footage. Check out the video for examples and a review!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Potts

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Despite being plastic, it's pretty sturdy. The stabilization is great. It might not be a gimbal but the video is still smooth and it's wayyy cheaper. You can still see slight up and down movement if you're holding it and walking but it's not shaky. I primarily use it with my smartphone and the smartphone clasp is strong. Almost hurt my finger cuz of how strong it is. Overall it's a great alternative to a gimbal. The C-shape design and lightweight build make it easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: AnonRev

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to receive this light weight 4-in-1 camera stabilizer! It is light weight, durable and easy to pack for travel! I can put my palm-size camcorder, Go Pro and cell phone on it to increase smoothness of video shooting. Another good thing about this stabilizer is that I can screw it on my tripod. This will save me so much time from switching between the tripod and stabilizer. I will be using this for my travel.
customer_reviews.author: TicTacTao

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality | Competitively Priced
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how fantaseal does it. This camera stabilizer has every attachment you can think of, yet is incredibly valued. The foam grip is premium, while the phone holder is solid as is the metal ball head mount; that’s somehow all included at this price point. What I really like about this stabilizer is how solid it feels in the hand; I can really trust my expensive Camera to sit securely on it without the risk of it falling. They even include a cold shoe mount on top... this one stabilizer has endless configurations for limitless creative opportunities.
customer_reviews.author: California Phantom

customer_reviews.title: The price should be higher because the build, quality, and versatility is definitely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while you have a product which blows you away with how it's built, the quality, and versatility. This is exactly one of those products. I just opened it and took me about 15 mins to familiarize myself with the setup/screws and there are endless amount of possibilities you can use this for. It has nice padding also on the bottom holder, and rubber grips underneath for when you want to put it down somewhere. I can't comment on the durability just yet but man it's a pretty solid build and for this price I may just buy another one. It should be priced higher, just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my digital video camera perfectly and has a shoe for a microphone or light on top. I am able to take very steady videos with it and it offers me the chance of filming at low or high angles without worrying about dropping the camera. Very well build and sturdy, this is a recommended product for those looking for a way to film without shaking the camera. Also fits on a standard tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Adelman

customer_reviews.title: Rig for My Gig
customer_reviews.text: I needed an economical rig so I could attach my gear and not have to worry about individual pieces. Attched is an LED light, Yi Action Cam 4K+, Samsung S7 and a spare battery for the gear. I also used a handlebar bike mount for the Samsung which is used as a monitor for the Action Cam. A few other mounts were from a bag of Go Pro accessories. I can also remove the LED light/spare battery and mount the Zoom H4N when I need better audio recording. I'm very satisfied with the setup and it will serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: The C-shape rig arrived a few days ago and I've been using it ever since. For my Canon G40 camcorder. It's one of those things you wonder how you got along without using it. Professional camcorders have a similar handle built-in to the unit, now I see why. The handle atop is super useful. Bottom rails for setting the camera down. Great for mounting a microphone. See photos. I've since slid the microphone back an inch or two.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: **Edit: these guys have emailed me promptly and can tell they really want to address the issue and help me out. quality service. also resending me a new piece that was defective :) stoked on the product! awesome rig, provides enough stability for some low angle skating clips on my action cam. only downside is the phone mount would not fit the top clip that was provided and the metal piece ended up coming off of it. Bummed because i really wanted to be able to see while I was filming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying something like this. I never really knew what a stabilizer did until I bought this. Comparing the videos before using the stabilizer vs. after using it, I see a hug difference! It's great, though I don't really know what a "good" stabilizer looks like. The top hold on the mount loosens up so maybe it's not the best (hence 4 stars) but it's definitely good for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Built quality
customer_reviews.text: The curve bar is super weak that I constantly have to be careful not exerting too much force on the top portion. So other than a light microphone mountable on the top portion it is not practical for extensive application. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Needs instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy equipment and I would've given 4 stars however there are no instructions. There are pieces I can't figure out how to use or what they are for. It would be nice to have instructions in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: My hand does not shake that bad!
customer_reviews.text: So why does my video look like a scene from an Earthquake? No more! The fantaseal camera stabilizer delivers what it promises. Nice assortment of mounting options. Use it with a WiFi action camera and a smart phone with the app installed and you have a great rig for going out in the field.
customer_reviews.author: ShotokuTech

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a lot of gear this year and this is definitely one of the winners. Super versatile for my GoPro, iPhone or dslr. I can attach a mic or flash on top easily. It can be set up several different ways. This thing rocks, I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: I Caruana

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy hand device
customer_reviews.text: While this is a piece of plastic it is very handy and seemly sturdy. Very versatile. See picture for at least one of the configurations. This shot is of a Canon 90D DSLR Movo Mic Bridge holder 7 inch external monitor
customer_reviews.author: Pastor J. Dan Renfro D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly an outstandingly versatile piece of equipment. I've just recently begun a sideline career as a videographer and as one of my first needs was a steadycam arm for my 6Splus I purchased this with price and versatility in mind... truly I made the RIGHT decision!
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made piece of video equipment and super versatile. Lot's of extra accessories to allow many different mounting options. I used the stabilizer with my GoPro Hero 7, Tascam TM-2X mic, and my phone as the viewing screen as shown in the photos. You can also steady record video using your phone phone camera alone. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: codawson

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: All my friends think I’m you tube famous! This equipment is well made, and can carry a lot of weight and maintain stability. I load a DSLR, led light and a portable charger and it still works great. The soft handle is super comfortable and makes carrying easy.
customer_reviews.author: Weekendrockstars

customer_reviews.title: The weight of a DSLR is too much for this plastic holder.
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing this for a smartphone or gopro it is probably perfect; however, the unit gives quite a bit of flex causing shake when so much weight is on it.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: An ok item to hold your phone or camera for recording.
customer_reviews.text: Will work ok to hold my phone. Package didn't come with the adapter to hold the go pro style camera but i guess it doesn't matter since I don't have one anyway. Overall it is nice in my opinion but not sure how it compares to more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Get those low shots smoother.
customer_reviews.text: Being able to hold the camera from above and get those low follow shots smoothly is very helpful. Of course, a gimble would be smoother, but for the price of this, it does a very good job helping to get a smoother shot. Adjustability and different mounting options are helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Zach ASMR

customer_reviews.title: How does it work???
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this but seeing as how I've never been able to use it, I'm kind of disapointed. I'm a videographer and was looking into small handheld options instead of a Gimble and found this. I was super excited to try it out but it seems to be missing the piece that attaches the camera to the gear. I missed the window of return so can't return it, but am pretty upset I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help stabilize my dslr with video but this seems to hinder me more than help me. I don’t really see how this can help with stabilization. This might work for iPhones or smaller cameras.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel Rig
customer_reviews.text: This equipment definitely deserves a five star because of its light weight, good stabilizing quality and good material.I travel a lot so its pretty easy to carry this rig.A nice suggestion to the manufacturer is to include an instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Kripal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect especially if you are just beginning there is no way i would be able to hold the camera that still with my hands without this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dior

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I don't get to use it as much as I thought I would, decent product. If you want a perfect non vibration video then invest more money

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute steal! I am shooting a music video so I attached lighting to the top of the stabilizer. It is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Me likey!
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition for any audio and video hobbiest. Very versatile and durable for the value of price verses quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for low angles but not for stability. False advertising but I knew what I was getting. Just dont call it stabalizer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera rig
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive camera rig. I use it with my Canon t7i and my go pro hero 6. This allows me to use my camera and mic all on same rig. This helps so much with stabilization when trying to pull off walking and running video. For the price this is a great add for your camera arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Time

customer_reviews.title: Seems great for exploring abandoned places  and ghost hunting.
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved it today, i havent used it/tested it out yet but overall after unboxing it and installing my camera, camera light and phone on it it appears to be sturdy. Ill update this review when i use it to go exploring and ghost hunting..i am currently enjoying it. Does what it is needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: not a stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: this “stabilizer” is very disappointing. This basically was just a grip for my camera. All my footage was very shaky no matter how hard I tried to keep it smooth. The shape makes it very difficult to even see your lens and the phone holder on top was also hard to use. Only good thing I can say is at least it didn’t cost too much. But if you’re looking for a stabilizer, this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Best investment money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best investment money can buy......if you don't have a steady hand you will need this unit.....work with all hand held cameras
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: @wess.world
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Has weight to it. Comes with a few adapters to fot basic grips... i have even more already so it is even better. Already used it. Check out my youtube and IG @ wess.world

customer_reviews.title: Nice setup. The tripod mount was cracked on it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice setup. The tripod mount was cracked on it's side but everything else looked and worked great. I made a video review on my channel "GiobunnyTech" It's my newest review if you would like to see test footage.

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility
customer_reviews.text: Use this to hold my iPhone and led light. I like the versatility of this product.

customer_reviews.title: Parts come off really fast

customer_reviews.title: Shaky
customer_reviews.text: This stabilizer is anything but that. I attached my iPhone and Nikon to this to record some footage of a home tour. I used both devices to see any differences in video quality and shakiness and both sets of footage has plenty of camera shake. You get what you pay for, so save your money and pay for a better stabilizer.

customer_reviews.title: Will not handle iPhone 10 with case.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this holder will not take a iPhone 10 with a case, and will not take a galaxy 5s with case.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit for all cameras
customer_reviews.text: It's made sturdy but my camera fits loosely on it. So I figure it might be useful for something in the future. I should have gotten the other brand. Lol

customer_reviews.title: best when holding the top when filming while walking or ...
customer_reviews.text: Fair product but a little to woobly, best when holding the top when filming while walking or running where it is more stable

customer_reviews.title: 5 out 5

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!

I love the many different positions available to mount my phone on either the top or bottom for a wide range of shots. Great product, makes shooting much more enjoyable.

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable product
customer_reviews.text: Real comfortable design and really versatile I use it with my phone and a light. Real stable versus using your hands l. Would really recommend it

customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to stabilize your video this is not the product for you. I shoot on a Sony A7rii and the hand holding playback and this rig were the same.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definatly better than nothing. Was pleased with how it stabalized my action cam shots of my kids. Easy to use, and you get some cool hip height perspective shots. Perfect for filming tots!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic

customer_reviews.title: Im Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im Satisfied with my purchase. I knew what I was getting, this is a really nice handle to make it easier to record footage on a gopro, it does way better than a selfie stick kind of handle, but not at a level of weight stabiliser or gimbal. For the price, I loved it, I got pretty good footage, this + an external mic + a cellphone on top to preview my gopro camera live feed = gold!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that does what it says it will. I use it with my action camera as well as my Digital SLR and video camera.

customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the long term quality of this item but I have to say I'm pretty impressed so far. For twenty bucks you get a very nice little grip. I use it with a hero6 and my pixel XL on the top as a monitor and it helps get those low shots while still being able to see what is in the frame. Worth the money.

customer_reviews.text: This is okay for holding a camera while movies through shots but not much else. It is NOT a stabilizer.

product_meta.title: Fantaseal 4in1 DSLR/Mirrorless/Action Camera +Camcorder +Smartphone Stabilizer Holder We-Media YouTube Vlog Low Position Video Rig Mount Fit for GoPro Sony DJI OSMO Action Nikon Canon iPhone Samsung
feature_bullets: Advanced Low Angles Shooting System for all DSLR cameras, DV, Compact Cameras, Action Cameras with a standard 1/4 inch thread. Ideal for making low camera position videos and Images with movable scene or micro shoots. Kind reminder: No gimbal and no battery.
Powerful anti-loose Cell Phone Clamp Mount for holding Cell Phone while shooting as the HD monitor in Sports. You can also control your GoPro by GoPro APP without GoPro remote control.
Removable Mini Ball Head Hot Shot Tripod Adapter can be used to attach Video Lights, Flashes, LED Lights, or Microphones in any postion , any degree.

GoPro Quick Release Buckle Plate - Attach your GoPro Action Camcorders/DJI OSMO ACTION and other Actioncams to the Stabilizer .Perfect portable platform for GoPro / Sony / Xiaomi Yi/ Garmin Verb XE for 4K shooting.

Light weight Shock-proof EVA handle and ergonomic C-shaped design that alleviates stress by offering a comfortable, secure grip for long time use. Great for Skateboarding, Rollerblading, Motor Racing, Biking, Surfing, Hunting, Snowboarding, Skiing and any Extreme Sports Situation where stability is a must
